title: Default iOS hotspot passwords hacked in less than a minute
contentencoded:
A group of German researchers has found a security problem in Apple's Internet hotspots for mobile devices. They can be easily hacked.

Chester Wisniewski at cybersecurity firm Sophos joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johson to discuss.
